subject: Mixed Martial Arts
lead_paragraph: In one of the most anticipated U.F.C. fights of the year, McGregor, 27, will fight Aldo, 29, for the featherweight championship on Saturday night in Las Vegas.
snippet: In one of the most anticipated U.F.C. fights of the year, McGregor, 27, will fight Aldo, 29, for the featherweight championship on Saturday night in Las Vegas.
